message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $18,000. I know you'll find value in it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but this product is truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to come down to $14,000, my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I still believe I can find it elsewhere for less. I am willing to pay up to $12,500 for it.
